name: Shard Swarm
description: The Shard Swarm is a medium-sized construct made up of sharp shards that can fly and envelop its targets.
memorable: It can reform and restrain foes while being immune to several damage types.
goals: To control the battlefield and restrain its enemies.
relations: It may be encountered alongside other constructs or mechanical creatures.
environment: Ruinous locations or areas filled with junk and debris.
strengths: Can disguise itself as junk and reform to evade damage.
weaknesses: Vulnerable to spells that target antimagic, which can incapacitate it.
attacks: Makes melee attacks with sharp shards dealing slashing damage, and ranged attacks with shrapnel dealing piercing damage.
most_powerful_ability: Contain, allowing it to envelop and restrain a foe within its space.
senses: It has blindsight up to 60 ft., allowing it to sense its environment despite being blind beyond that range.
additional_information: Immune to poison and psychic damage.
Cannot regain hit points or gain temporary HP.
Occupies the same space as other creatures.
Can move through openings large enough for a pebble.
Disguises as a pile of junk when not flying.
test_queries: junk pile that attacks with slashing damage
shard monster that flies and restrains
swarm with unique battlefield control tactics
